TestCase.name: testAvoidAggregatePushDown
TestCase.Resource: StreamExecGroupAggregate(groupBy=[b], select=[b, COUNT_RETRACT(a) AS EXPR$1, SUM_RETRACT(c) AS EXPR$2, SUM_RETRACT(d) AS EXPR$3]) +- StreamExecExchange(distribution=[hash[b]]) +- StreamExecCalc(select=[b, a, c, d]) +- StreamExecJoinTable(join=[b, a, c, d, id], source=[TestDimensionTable(id, name, age)], on=[[1-0]], joinType=[InnerJoin], where=[>(age, 10)], period=[PROCTIME()]) +- StreamExecCalc(select=[b, a, c, d]) +- StreamExecGroupAggregate(groupBy=[a, b], select=[a, b, SUM(c) AS c, SUM(d) AS d]) +- StreamExecExchange(distribution=[hash[a, b]]) +- StreamExecDataStreamScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_db, _DataStreamTable_1]])

TestCase.name: testJoinOnDifferentKeyTypes
TestCase.Resource: StreamExecCalc(select=[a, b, c, PROCTIME(proc) AS proc, rt, id, name, age]) +- StreamExecJoinTable(join=[a, b, c, proc, rt, b0, id, name, age], source=[TestDimensionTable(id, name, age)], on=[[5-0]], joinType=[InnerJoin], period=[$cor0.proc]) +- StreamExecCalc(select=[a, b, c, proc, rt, CAST(b) AS b0]) +- StreamExecDataStreamScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_db, _DataStreamTable_0]])

TestCase.name: testJoinStaticTable
TestCase.Resource: StreamExecCalc(select=[a, b, name]) +- StreamExecJoinTable(join=[a, b, id, name], source=[TestDimensionTable(id, name, age)], on=[[0-0]], joinType=[InnerJoin]) +- StreamExecCalc(select=[a, b]) +- StreamExecDataStreamScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_db, _DataStreamTable_0]])

TestCase.name: testJoinTemporalTable
TestCase.Resource: StreamExecCalc(select=[a, b, c, PROCTIME(proc) AS proc, rt, id, name, age]) +- StreamExecJoinTable(join=[a, b, c, proc, rt, id, name, age], source=[TestDimensionTable(id, name, age)], on=[[0-0]], joinType=[InnerJoin], period=[$cor0.proc]) +- StreamExecDataStreamScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_db, _DataStreamTable_0]])

TestCase.name: testJoinTemporalTableWithDimensionTableCalcPushDown
TestCase.Resource: StreamExecCalc(select=[a, b, c, PROCTIME(proc) AS proc, rt, id, name, CAST(10) AS age]) +- StreamExecJoinTable(join=[a, b, c, proc, rt, id, name], source=[TestDimensionTable(id, name, age)], on=[[0-0]], joinType=[InnerJoin], where=[AND(=(age, 10), >(CAST(name), 1000))], period=[$cor0.proc]) +- StreamExecDataStreamScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_db, _DataStreamTable_0]])

TestCase.name: testJoinTemporalTableWithFilterPushDown
TestCase.Resource: StreamExecCalc(select=[a, b, c, PROCTIME(proc) AS proc, rt, id, name, CAST(10) AS age]) +- StreamExecJoinTable(join=[a, b, c, proc, rt, id, name], source=[TestDimensionTable(id, name, age)], on=[[0-0]], joinType=[InnerJoin], where=[=(age, 10)], period=[$cor0.proc]) +- StreamExecCalc(select=[a, b, c, proc, rt], where=[>(c, 1000)]) +- StreamExecDataStreamScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_db, _DataStreamTable_0]])

TestCase.name: testJoinTemporalTableWithMultiIndexColumn
TestCase.Resource: StreamExecCalc(select=[a, b, c, PROCTIME(proc) AS proc, rt, id, CAST('AAA') AS name, CAST(10) AS age]) +- StreamExecJoinTable(join=[a, b, c, proc, rt, id], source=[TestDimensionTable(id, name, age)], on=[[0-0]], joinType=[InnerJoin], where=[AND(=(age, 10), =(name, 'AAA'))], period=[$cor0.proc]) +- StreamExecCalc(select=[a, b, c, proc, rt], where=[>(c, 1000)]) +- StreamExecDataStreamScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_db, _DataStreamTable_0]])

TestCase.name: testJoinTemporalTableWithNestedQuery
TestCase.Resource: StreamExecCalc(select=[a, b, PROCTIME(proc) AS proc, id, name, age]) +- StreamExecJoinTable(join=[a, b, proc, id, name, age], source=[TestDimensionTable(id, name, age)], on=[[0-0]], joinType=[InnerJoin], period=[$cor0.proc]) +- StreamExecCalc(select=[a, b, proc], where=[>(c, 1000)]) +- StreamExecDataStreamScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_db, _DataStreamTable_0]])

TestCase.name: testLeftJoinTemporalTable
TestCase.Resource: StreamExecCalc(select=[a, b, c, PROCTIME(proc) AS proc, rt, id, name, age]) +- StreamExecJoinTable(join=[a, b, c, proc, rt, id, name, age], source=[TestDimensionTable(id, name, age)], on=[[0-0]], joinType=[LeftOuterJoin], period=[PROCTIME()]) +- StreamExecDataStreamScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_db, _DataStreamTable_0]])

TestCase.name: testJoinTemporalTableWithProjectionPushDown
TestCase.Resource: StreamExecCalc(select=[a, b, c, PROCTIME(proc) AS proc, rt, id]) +- StreamExecJoinTable(join=[a, b, c, proc, rt, id], source=[TestDimensionTable(id, name, age)], on=[[0-0]], joinType=[InnerJoin], period=[PROCTIME()]) +- StreamExecDataStreamScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_db, _DataStreamTable_0]])
